verse.name: v1
verse.lines: We've turned the page,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: For a new day has dawned

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: We've rearranged what is right and what's wrong

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Somehow we've drifted so far from the truth

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: That we can't get back home

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Where are the virtues that once gave us light

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: Where are the morals that governed our lives

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: Someday we all will awake and look back

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: Just to find what we've lost

verse.name: v10
verse.lines: We need to get back

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: To the basics of life

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: A heart that is pure

verse.name: v13
verse.lines: And a love that is blind

verse.name: v14
verse.lines: A faith that is fervently

verse.name: v15
verse.lines: Grounded in Christ

verse.name: v16
verse.lines: The hope that endures for all times

verse.name: v17
verse.lines: These are the basics,

verse.name: v18
verse.lines: The newest rage is to reason it out

verse.name: v19
verse.lines: Just meditate and you can overcome every doubt

verse.name: v20
verse.lines: After all man is a God, they say

verse.name: v21
verse.lines: God is no longer alive

verse.name: v22
verse.lines: But I still believe in the old rugged cross

verse.name: v23
verse.lines: And I still believe there is hope for the lost

verse.name: v24
verse.lines: And I know the rock of all ages will stand

verse.name: v25
verse.lines: Through changes of time

verse.name: v26
verse.lines: We've let the darkness invade us too long

verse.name: v27
verse.lines: We've got to turn the tide

verse.name: v28
verse.lines: Oh and we need the passion that burned long ago

verse.name: v29
verse.lines: To come and open our eyes

verse.name: v30
verse.lines: Theres no room for compromise
